author: norman
msg: Start to split spoolmanager to mailetcontainer-api, mailetcontainer-impl and mailetcontainer-camel. This includes moving mailets to mailet module too (JAMES-1051)

author: mgrigorov
msg: Move the initialization of PageAccessSynchronizer in #internalInit() so it can use IRequestCycleSettings#getTimeout() to configure itself.
Note: this changes the current '2 minutes' to '1 minute' as in 1.4.x

author: mgrigorov
msg: Use providers to configure the Application.
Add DefaultPageManagerProvider (must be part of r1001214)
